subject: Soccer
Extradition
Bribery and Kickbacks
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: The president of Conmebol, Juan Ángel Napout, who was arrested in Zurich last week, agreed to be extradited on Tuesday, the Swiss authorities said.
snippet: The president of Conmebol, Juan Ángel Napout, who was arrested in Zurich last week, agreed to be extradited on Tuesday, the Swiss authorities said.
